title: Bag, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the Estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Small bag made from four sections of yellow silk brocaded with pink, green and white silk and silver metallic thread in floral desing. Bound with metal thread galoon, with drawstring at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade). Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the Estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes. 1943-5-1.
